summary: This is an email chain from April 2020 discussing a new potential victim who contacted the U.S. Attorney's office. The victim reported meeting Jeffrey Epstein through Leon Black and being abused starting years prior when she was a minor. The emails coordinate for the FBI to reach out to the victim to obtain a statement.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Mentioned as the person through whom the new victim met Jeffrey Epstein, according to the victim's report.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The victim reported being abused by Epstein after being introduced through Leon Black.

connections.description: The victim reported meeting Epstein through Leon Black, indicating a social or acquaintance connection between them.
The victim reported being abused by Epstein for some time starting years ago when she was a minor.

events.title: New victim report to U.S. Attorney's office
events.description: An individual called the U.S. Attorney's office to report being abused by Jeffrey Epstein after meeting him through Leon Black, starting years prior when she was a minor.

keyFacts: A new potential victim contacted the U.S. Attorney's office in April 2020 alleging abuse by Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim reported meeting Epstein through financier Leon Black.
The abuse allegedly started years prior when the victim was a minor.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney requested the FBI to reach out to the victim to obtain a statement.
The victim's name and contact information are redacted in the document.
